thread.title: great hotel for the value and location
thread.title_full: great hotel for the value and location - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: newb k
title: great hotel for the value and location
text: this hotel is less then a 5 minute walk from the Eiffel tower and right across the street from the subway. all major destinations are a 10-15 minute subway ride. the rooms are updated and clean. the breakfast was normal for Europe as well as the room size. the staff spoke English and was super helpfull. I'd highly recommend this hotel.
